```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)

url <- "https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Mk1YGH9LqjF7drJE-td1G_JkdADOU0eMlrP01WFBT8s/pub?gid=0&single=true&output=csv"

# Read in the data
rice <- read.csv("Desktop/543/RiceRiversCenter_PierWaterQualityData_2014 - Data copy.csv")

# 1. Make Date object
rice$DateTime <- as.POSIXct(rice$DateTime, format="%m/%d/%Y %I:%M:%S %p")

# 2. Create month and weekday objects
rice$Month <- month(rice$DateTime, label=TRUE)  
rice$Weekday <- wday(rice$DateTime, label=TRUE)  

# 3. Convert Fahrenheit to Celsius
rice$AirTempC <- (rice$AirTempF - 32) * 5 / 9  

# 4. Get rid of extra data
rice <- select(rice, -RecordID, -WindSpeed_mph, -RelHumidity, -$AirTempC, -PH_mv, -Rain_in )  # Remove unnecessary columns

# 5. Reorder the columns
rice <- rice %>% select(DateTime, Month, Weekday, AirTempC, everything())  # Reorder columns


head(rice)
View(RiceRiversCenter_PierWaterQualityData_2014_Data_copy)


```
